text: sesang-e jinsil-i anin geos-eulogeomanhae haneunja iss-euni naui jingpyo lobuteo geudeul-eul meolli dulila geudeul i modeun yejeung-eul bomae geugeos-eul midji anihago geudeul-i olbaleun gil-eul bo mae geugil-eul ttaleuji anihamyeo ohi lyeo geulusdoem-eul bogo geu gil-eul ttaleum-i la geuleohgehayeo geudeul-eun hananim-ui malsseum-eul geoyeoghago malsseum-e geeulli haessnola
